post:
UltraVPS.eu is a brand of Bradler & Krantz GmbH Co. KG. Since 1999 we offer high quality hosting services to our customers and are amongst the most established providers in Europe. With our product series UltraVPS.eu we offer powerful and reliable virtual servers for low prices.

We are excited to announce our new London Cloud location, hosted in the [Virtus London1](https://virtusdatacentres.com/locations/london-1-enfield) data center and powered by [Clouvider's premium network](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/about-us/network/).

To celebrate our new location we offer the following special deal:
---------------------------------------------------------

**Cloud Special-2**

* 2 GB RAM
* 2 CPU cores
* 50 GB redundant SSD storage (ZFS based)
* 1 TB Monthly Transfer (in+out)
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 12 months
* Available in Amsterdam (Netherlands), Duesseldorf (Germany), Dallas (USA), London (UK), Los Angeles (USA)

40 EUR per year incl. VAT (~ 41.70 USD excl. VAT)

[[ORDER]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_special&lang=en)

Other special deals available in March:
--------------------------------

**Storage Special**

* 1 GB RAM
* 1 CPU core
* 750 GB redundant data storage (ZFS based)
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* 5 TB monthly transfer (in+out)
* Contract term: 12 months
* Available in Amsterdam (Netherlands)

48 EUR per year incl. VAT (~ 50 USD excl. VAT)

[[ORDER]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_storage&lang=en)

**LowEndServer-1**

* KVM virtualization
* 256 MB RAM
* 1 CPU Core
* 10 GB RAID-10 SATA Storage
* 500 GB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 12 months
* Available in Düsseldorf (Germany)

12 EUR incl. VAT per year (~ 12.50 USD excl. VAT)

[[ORDER]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_lowend&lang=en)

**LowEndServer-2**

* KVM virtualization
* 384 MB RAM
* 1 CPU Core
* 10 GB RAID-10 SATA Storage
* 500 GB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 12 months
* Available in Düsseldorf (Germany)

18 EUR incl. VAT per year (~ 18.75 USD excl. VAT)

[[ORDER]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_lowend&lang=en)


**Special offers can't be combined with affiliate codes.**

[[Further information]](https://www.ultravps.eu/en/)

Do you have any questions? Please do not hesitate to drop us a mail at info@ultravps.eu.
